description: Veramo is a JavaScript Framework for Verifiable Data that enables creation and management of decentralized identifiers and verifiable credentials without worrying about interop and vendor lock-in. The framework is built around a plugin system and runs on Node, Browsers, and React Native straight out of the box. Veramo supports flexible key management, storage, and multiple DID methods for building decentralized identity applications.
project_description: Veramo is a JavaScript Framework for Verifiable Data that enables creation and management of decentralized identifiers and verifiable credentials without worrying about interop and vendor lock-in. The framework is built around a plugin system and runs on Node, Browsers, and React Native straight out of the box. Veramo supports flexible key management, storage, and multiple DID methods for building decentralized identity applications.
